mapper.insert: insert into board (boardnum, name, title, content) values (boardseq.nextval, #{name}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where boardnum=#{boardnum}
update board set hits=hits+1 where boardnum=#{boardnum}
mapper.select: select boardnum, name, title, content, hits, to_char(indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') indate from board where boardnum=#{boardnum}
select boardnum, name, title, content, hits, to_char(indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') indate from board order by boardnum desc
